title: Soccer Ownership Shakeup, SNY Sale, 2021 NFL Draft
itunes:title: Soccer Ownership Shakeup, SNY Sale, 2021 NFL Draft
description:
There's rumbling of an ownership shakeup across the pond, as Spotify’s billionaire founder Daniel Ek is working on a bid to take control of Arsenal F.C. The former owners of the New York Mets, are considering a sale of regional sports network SNY, according to Sportico. Plus, you can expect to see Roger Goodell's famous hugs back at the NFL Draft this year. Jason, Barr, and Lynch give you the hot takes on this Monday morning podcast.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
